channel.title: 317 Remade
channel.description:
Well, me and my friend Josh decided to re-make 317 RuneScape, so far it's all going well.
[b][u]So far what we've done;[/u][/b] [i]Added all Varrock shops/autospawn [i]Removing thread per client. (Done.) [i]Added character screen interface, ability to change your character looks. [i]Added 100% RuneScape shop dialogue in Varrock. (For all shops, also from scratch) [i]Player follows in the wilderness, whilst attacking that is. [i]Added 100% 2nd NPC clicking. (Trading, etc.) [i]Fixed & added a lot of ancient spells. [i]Added some weapon specials, only a few ATM. (DDS, Whip, MSB) [b]More to come, updated daily.[/i][/b]
[u][i]Pictures. (1 So far)[/i][/u] 1. NPC dialogue from scratch. [IMG]http://i360.photobucket.com/albums/oo43/Jordiescape/pic1dialogue.jpg[/img]
NOTE: This server plans to have 100% real RuneScape PKing. As in 100% I mean for certain over 98% =D.
More to come soon, I'll update when I have more time.

item.title: 317 Remade

item.description:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:14, topic:241268”][quote author=the soul link=topic=317591.msg2519913#msg2519913 date=1225831119]

Thanks. Started a base on the cooks assistant quest, just got to find out the frame for more than one line of dialogue in my UpdateNPCChat() method. Si Force (Marc) is trying to help me on this bit.

Oh, I see. Well good luck.
[/quote]
Seems that won’t happen, as when I do add it it makes the NPCs heads freeze in the dialogue, I’d rather just use extra cases =].

eh not bad, it would turn in to a great source after u get the pking, and specials done.

Thanks, I’m currently working on the ‘Cooks Assistant’ quest, just to test my use of dialogue =D[/quote]
cool. hope u do good

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Remade
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Well, me and my friend Josh decided to re-make 317 RuneScape, so far it’s all going well.

So far what we’ve done;
[i]Added all Varrock shops/autospawn
[i]Removing thread per client. (Done.)
[i]Added character screen interface, ability to change your character looks.
[i]Added 100% RuneScape shop dialogue in Varrock. (For all shops, also from scratch)
[i]Player follows in the wilderness, whilst attacking that is.
[i]Added 100% 2nd NPC clicking. (Trading, etc.)
[i]Fixed & added a lot of ancient spells.
Added some weapon specials, only a few ATM. (DDS, Whip, MSB)
[b]More to come, updated daily.[/b]

Pictures. (1 So far)

  1. NPC dialogue from scratch.

NOTE: This server plans to have 100% real RuneScape PKing. As in 100% I mean for certain over 98% =D.

More to come soon, I’ll update when I have more time.

Read full topic
